title:
Antisymmetric maximum principles and Hopf's lemmas for the Logarithmic
  Laplacian, with applications to symmetry results
abstract:
We prove antisymmetric maximum principles and Hopf-type lemmas for linear
problems described by the Logarithmic Laplacian. As application, we prove the
symmetry of solutions for semilinear problems in symmetric sets, and a rigidity
result for the parallel surface problem for the Logarithmic Laplacian.
